original_text: And my people are bent to backsliding from me: though they called them to the most High, none at all would exalt him.
korean_text: 내 백성이 끝끝내 내게서 물러가나니 비록 그들을 불러 위에 계신 이에게로 돌아오라 할지라도 일어나는 자가 하나도 없도다

sentences.original_text: And my people are bent to backsliding from me
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 백성은 나에게서 떠나려고 기울어져 있으며

sentences.original_text: though they called them to the most High
none at all would exalt him
